EmailTemplate.name: Follow Up From MBO Partners (1341609966.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up From MBO Partners (1341609966.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear David, Some time ago you reach out to MBO gauging our interest in doing a case study around your experience as an Independent Consultant. I would like to speak with you to find out a bit more about the work you do and some of your experiences to pass on to our marketing team. I also wanted to pass along some of the resources we develop specifically designed for independent consultants for your review:· Recorded Independent Consulting Webinar Index <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index>· Reports on Independent Consulting in America <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/>· Independent Consulting Brief we send out Monthly <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief> Now might not be the right time for you, but if you could provide me with an update that would be great! Have a great weekend, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
